luggage.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the cases, bags etc that you carry when you are travelling
luggage.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: They searched his luggage for illegal drugs.
luggage.translation[0].note_box[0].items: Luggage is an uncountable noun and is not used in the plural You say
He carried our luggage to our room
He carried our luggages to our room
Luggage is always followed by a singular verb
What happens if my luggage gets lost?
When talking about one suitcase or bag, you say a piece of luggage or an item of luggage
Each piece of luggage can weigh up to 20 kilos

bags that you carry when you are travelling

all the things that someone has with them when they are travelling
